meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 26, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Impact of AI in Local Government Permit Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the impact of AI technology in local government permit review processes.

agenda_items.description: Presentation and discussion regarding the external audit for the year 2023.

agenda_items.description: Update from the Inspector General regarding ongoing investigations and activities.

agenda_items.title: Annual Investment Policy Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the annual investment policy by the Assistant Director of Treasury.

agenda_items.title: Development Services - Monthly Performance Update & Process Map Improvements
agenda_items.description: Monthly performance update and discussion on process map improvements.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment Opportunities
